original_text: But Paul thought not good to take him with them, who departed from them from Pamphylia, and went not with them to the work.
korean_text: 바울은 밤빌리아에서 자기들을 떠나 함께 일하러 가지 아니한 자를 데리고 가는 것이 옳지 않다 하여

sentences.original_text: who departed from them from Pamphylia
and went not with them to the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들과 함께 일하러 가지 않았다
